title: Concerning Children - passage as a whole contrasts

content.prompt: In the passage as a whole, the author contrasts which of the following?

choices.label: The treatment of children and the treatment of adults
The teaching of language to children and the teaching of language to foreigners
The behavior of children and the behavior of foreigners
The philosophy held by children and the philosophy held by adults

skill.text: Skill 5.C: Recognize and explain the use of methods of development to accomplish a purpose.
